participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative, sociable, and passionate about music. Loves sharing experiences with friends.
participant_1.background: I could not live without my cell phone. I am more of a cat person than a dog person. I enjoy the occasional drink with friends. My mom is my best friend.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous with a lively spirit. Eager to explore new things and make memories.
participant_2.background: I go to a catholic high school in New England. I am 17. I plan to raise hell and sew my wild oats. I have lived a very sheltered life.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to hang out with my friends, go to parties, and just have a good time.
Do you have any hobbies?
I love to read and write. I'm also learning to play the piano.
That's cool! I'm a musician myself. I play the guitar and the drums.
Oh, that's awesome! I wish I could play an instrument.
It's not too hard to learn. You should give it a try!
Maybe I will.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably country music.
Oh, really? I don't listen to much country music.
You should! There's some really good country music out there.
Maybe I will. I've been meaning to listen to more music.
You should! Music is a great way to relax and have a good time.
I agree. I love listening to music when I'm working out or just hanging out.
Me too! Music is the best.
So what do you want to do when you're out of high school?
I want to go to college and study law. I want to be a lawyer.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll be a great lawyer.
Thanks! I hope so.
So what's your favorite thing about catholic high school?
My favorite thing is the community. Everyone is so supportive and friendly.
That's great! I'm glad you have a good experience at your school.
I am too. It's a great place to learn and grow.
